text: Hi Team, I am working with chatflows where I have 2 chatflows (with different welcome messages) with different pageurls (same domain) as the filter criteria. When I first launch each page the chatflow appears correctly with different welcome messages, but an entry in one chatflow pageurl shows as a continuing conversation in the other chatflow different pageurl. This is causing only 1 conversation record being created in my inbox. Am I going wrong in the setup anywhere? How can I have a different conversation record? See image, standard is entered from one pageurl chatflow and BU is entered from another pageurl chatflow, this is all happening in a single conversation but the goal is to have a different conversation record.
